item.title: About
item.description:
Hey, I’m Lead Acid, an AI artist working with open source technologies to create lewd furry arts and comics.

My current comic series is about Maple, a anthro raccoon girl finding a job at a sex shop.

One page is uploaded every Friday; you can see new pages before everyone else by supporting me on Patreon!

For contact, write me on X!

‚ö†Ô∏è This website is intended for adults only (18+).
All characters depicted are fictional and portrayed as adults.
